snippet.title: Cosmorists - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The official trailer of the survival crafting game Cosmorists, launching onto Steam as an Early access title on Oct 7th, 2024🚀
👇Wishlist Cosmorists during the wait!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2564820/Cosmorists/

⛏️Dig deep to find increasingly advanced resources and enemies!
🔬Do science to better your survival capabilities!
🪐Explore and exploit other planets!
⚙️Automate the collection of certain resources!

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Cosmorists/
Previous trailer from 2023: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XbbGJJC70cw

Note:
This game is singleplayer only, and will remain singleplayer for the foreseeable future

#cosmorists, #steam, #trailer
